<div><a href="http://googleweblight.com/?lite_url=http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EkMvyjoqXKI/Vl2f9xX5dqI/AAAAAAAADWA/meVlamgdLoc/s1600/Mengganti%252BFungsi%252BWidget%252BLabel%252BMenjadi%252BDropdown.png&amp;ts=1493305112&amp;sig=AJsQQ1DBDzXYcThsBofGHJO6ZkbmABO6ag" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow"> <br><img alt="Mengganti Fungsi Widget Label Menjadi Dropdown" id="-wl-ii0" src="data:image/webp;base64,"> <br></a></div>&nbsp; &nbsp;I will provide another option of the label widget that can be made dropdown, it looks exactly the same as the dropdown in the archive widget.<br>The purpose of changing the look of this label widget is to save space on the blog page if in my blog there are many labels that make the blog look narrow because it is not just a label widget that is on the blog.<br><div><div id="lite-ad-2"></div></div>In addition your blog will look more tidy and professional.<br>For those who want to mecobanya, please follow the following tutorial:<br><h4><strong>Replacing the Label Widget Function to Be Dropdown<br></strong><br></h4>1. Go to Blogger&gt; Template&gt; Then find this code<br><pre class="tr_bq"><span id="span_349b_0">&lt;ul&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_1">  &lt;b:loop values='data:labels' var='label'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_2">    &lt;li&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_3">      &lt;b:if cond='data:blog.url == data:label.url'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_4">        &lt;data:label.name/&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_5">        &lt;b:else/&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_6">        &lt;a expr:href='data:label.url'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_7">          &lt;data:label.name/&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_8">        &lt;/a&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_9">      &lt;/b:if&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_10">      (</span><span id="span_349b_11">&lt;data:label.count/&gt;)</span><br><span id="span_349b_12">    &lt;/li&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_13">  &lt;/b:loop&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_14">&lt;/ul&gt;<br></span><br></pre>Replace all the code above with this code<br><pre class="tr_bq"><span id="span_349b_15">&lt;div class="dropmedown"&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_16">&lt;select  class="dropdown-select" onchange='location=this.options[this.selectedIndex].value;'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_17">  &lt;option&gt; </span><mark id="mark_349b_0">Search Category</mark><span id="span_349b_18"> &lt;/option&gt;   &lt;b:loop values='data:labels' var='label'&gt;     &lt;option expr:value='data:label.url'&gt;       &lt;data:label.name/&gt; (       &lt;data:label.count/&gt;)     &lt;/option&gt;   &lt;/b:loop&gt; &lt;/select&gt; &lt;/div&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_19">  &lt;b:loop values='data:labels' var='label'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_20">    &lt;option expr:value='data:label.url'&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_21">      &lt;data:label.name/&gt; (</span><span id="span_349b_22">&lt;data:label.count/&gt;)</span><br><span id="span_349b_23">    &lt;/option&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_24">  &lt;/b:loop&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_25">&lt;/select&gt;</span><br><span id="span_349b_26">&lt;/div&gt;<br></span><br></pre><br>Ex Original HTML:<br><iframe align="center" frameborder="no" height="500px" name="Colored Widget" scrolling="yes" src="https://source.l3n4r0x.cf/php/codepen.php?user=arlinadesign&amp;id=zrOOOO&amp;tab=html&amp;h=500" width="100%"><br /></iframe><br><blockquote>NOTE: Replace any posts marked with your posts.</blockquote>2. Next, add the code below before&nbsp;<kbd>]]&gt; &lt;/ b: skin&gt;&nbsp;</kbd>or &lt;/ style&gt;<br><pre class="tr_bq"><span id="span_349b_27">/* Dropdown Label */</span><br><span id="span_349b_28">.dropmedown select{outline:none;cursor:pointer}</span><br><span id="span_349b_29">.dropmedown{display:inline-block;position:relative;overflow:hidden;width:100%;background:#fff;border:1px solid transparent;border-radius:3px;height:36px;line-height:36px;color:#444}</span><br><span id="span_349b_30">.dropmedown:before,.dropmedown:after{content:'';position:absolute;z-index:2;top:13px;right:12px;width:0;height:0;line-height:36px;border:4px dashed;border-color:#888 transparent;pointer-events:none}</span><br><span id="span_349b_31">.dropmedown:before{border-bottom-style:solid;border-top:none}</span><br><span id="span_349b_32">.dropmedown:after{margin-top:8px;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom:none}</span><br><span id="span_349b_33">.dropdown-select{position:relative;width:100%;margin:0;padding:6px 8px 6px 10px;height:36px;line-height:18px;font-size:12px;color:#62717a;text-shadow:0 1px #fff;background:#f2f2f2;background:rgba(0,0,0,0)!important;border:0;border-radius:0;-webkit-appearance:none}</span><br><span id="span_349b_34">.dropdown-select&gt;option{margin:3px;padding:6px 8px;text-shadow:none;background:#f8f8f8;outline:none;border:0;border-radius:3px;cursor:pointer}<br></span><br></pre><br>Original CSS:<br><iframe frameborder="no" height="500px" name="Colored Widget" scrolling="yes" src="https://source.l3n4r0x.cf/php/codepen.php?user=arlinadesign&amp;id=zrOOOO&amp;tab=css&amp;h=500" width="100%"><br /></iframe><br>3. Save the template and see the results.<br><iframe frameborder="no" height="500px" name="Colored Widget" scrolling="yes" src="https://source.l3n4r0x.cf/php/codepen.php?user=arlinadesign&amp;id=zrOOOO&amp;tab=result&amp;h=500" width="100%"><br /></iframe><br><br><h4>Want To Edit From My friend Pen?</h4>Here it: <a alt="codepen.io" href="http://codepen.io/arlinadesign/pen/zrOOOO" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow" title="codepen.io">Codepen.io</a><br><br>Do you think this article help you ?, please share this :)
